alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 8:36PM CDT until June 14 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Deep Fork River near Beggs affecting Okmulgee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Deep Fork River near Beggs. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs. Webster Road north of the gage site may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fluctuate near or just above flood stage through early Monday evening. It will then begin to fall, and will fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
